name: Pocket Dust
description:
Controls: Left and right mouse buttons.

There is no goal;  combine the elements and explore your virtual sandbox. 

I hope this game provides you with delight and intrigue, as these types of games have for me over the years.

Written in C for the WASM4 Game Jam. Source code is available for free!

Inspired by DAN-BALL's powder game: Dust (hence the name).
